: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus heard Elita start to cry from the bedroom. He looked back to Flicker.
Rodimus Prime: Please excuse me. If you could see yourself out, I need to check on Elita.
Rodimus went into the bedroom and saw Nightlight trying to calm Elita.
Rodimus Prime: Is she hungry?
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight/Elita:

Elita suddenly woke up and whined, Nightlight uneasy started to 
check her . "What's wrong, little one?"said softly Nightlight "Why 
are you whinning?"
